sentences.en: All agog to know what had happened.
sentences.cn: 大家都急于知道发生了什么事情.

sentences.en: All London was agog to see the two " parents " of radium.
sentences.cn: 伦敦全城都渴望见到这两位镭的 “ 父母 ”.

sentences.en: How can polymorphous erythemaeffect a radical cure ? Be agog!
sentences.cn: 多形红斑怎么才能根治? 急切!

sentences.en: I’ve been agog all afternoon, waiting for the next part of your story.
sentences.cn: 整个下午我都在兴奋地期待着，等你讲下一段故事。
保罗满心好奇，兴奋地期待着。

sentences.en: That set the whole town agog with excitement.
sentences.cn: 那件事使全镇的居民兴奋不已.

sentences.en: The children were all agog to hear the story.
sentences.cn: 孩子们都渴望着要听这个故事.

sentences.en: The children were all agog to see their parents.
sentences.cn: 孩子们都兴奋异常的急于要见父母.

sentences.en: The children were all agog to see their presents.
sentences.cn: 孩子都兴奋地急着要看给他们的礼物.

sentences.en: The children were all agog with excitement at the circus.
sentences.cn: 孩子们都兴奋地渴望看马戏.

sentences.en: The city was agog with rumours last night that the two had been executed.
sentences.cn: 那两人已被处决的传言昨晚搞得全城沸沸扬扬。

sentences.en: The ovters were all agog to see their new president.
sentences.cn: 选民们急不可耐,要看他们的新总统.

sentences.en: The prospect of Christmas left the children agog.
sentences.cn: 对圣诞节的憧憬使得孩子们兴奋不已

sentences.en: The students were all agog to know their grades.
sentences.cn: 学生们都急着想知道他们的成绩.

sentences.en: The victory set the whole town agog with excitement.
sentences.cn: 那项胜利使得全镇感到兴奋异常的.

sentences.en: The villagers were agog for the news.
sentences.cn: 村民们很兴奋地急于听那消息.

sentences.en: The villagers were agog to hear the news.
sentences.cn: 村民们很兴奋地急着要听那消息.

trans.tran_en: very excited about something and wanting to find out more
